features.name: Terminal Scroll Fix
features.description: Restored VS Code terminal scroll functionality

features.name: Tab Autocompletion
features.description: Fixed Tab key for proper autocompletion

features.name: Command Security
features.description: Improved heredoc parsing prevents command smuggling

features.name: Bash Permissions
features.description: Fixed environment variable wrapper command matching

features.name: Session Management
features.description: Eliminated duplicate sessions in VS Code

features.name: Sandbox Security
features.description: Blocked unauthorized writes to skills directory

releaseHighlight: Critical VS Code terminal and autocompletion fixes with enhanced security measures
sourceContent: - Fixed VS Code terminal scroll-to-top regression introduced in 2.1.37 - Fixed Tab key queueing slash commands instead of autocompleting - Fixed bash permission matching for commands using environment variable wrappers - Fixed text between tool uses disappearing when not using streaming - Fixed duplicate sessions when resuming in VS Code extension - Improved heredoc delimiter parsing to prevent command smuggling - Blocked writes to .claude/skills directory in sandbox mode
